articles.author: Clothilde Goujard
articles.title: Hezbollah fires rockets at Israel in response to killing of Hamas leader - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Rocket barrage on Saturday was ‘initial response’ to suspected Israeli killing of senior Hamas official Saleh al-Arouri, Hezbollah says.
articles.content: Lebanese militant group Hezbollah fired dozens of rockets at Israel on Saturday in retaliation for the targeted killing of a Hamas leader in Beirut this week amid mounting fears of a larger regional … [+2754 chars]
